articles.title: Embattled payments provider Tyro defends outage response - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Embattled payments technology company Tyro has defended its response to week long outages after its terminals were 'bricked' leaving businesses unable to process payments.
articles.content: "We understand the significance of this disruption and sincerely apologise to our impacted merchants," he said. "We are committed to genuinely considering all options to help our customers who have b… [+1498 chars]
